Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation providing ESOL courses and help with the "Life in the UK" Citizenship test. Also provides language classes (Arabic, French, Spanish and Urdu), guitar, keyboard and drum lessons, creative writing, playreading, arts and crafts, knitting class, IT for the over 50's, general IT classes, literary and numeracy classes, GSE support classes and IELTS (International English Language Testing System). Also has an internet caf√©.

category.entry: EDUCATION - ENGLISH FOR SPEAKERS OF OTHER LANGUAGES (ESOL)
